title.en: Kuchi ga Dame nara Yubisaki de

altTitles.en: If the Mouth Won't Say It, these Fingertips Will
If the Mouth Is No Good, Then the Fingertips Will Do

description.en:
Koharu Mori has become recognized within the company as a "taciturn and cool designer" at first glance. But the truth is that she's carrying a trauma from the past because of her stuttering problem. As a result, she carried on through life with the mantra "If I only use the bare minimum greetings", then "I won't have to form any personal relationships". 

Not wanting to go through that past experience a second time, she spent her days suppressing her originally bright and cheerful personality. Despite that, she actually wanted to get involved with someone else and experience things like romance and marriage, for example. 

While bearing such aspirations, one day she bumps into the eloquent and popular Narita from the Sales department. To keep her from falling down, he held her close with his arms tightly wrapped around her, which made Koharu's heart race; but his interest lay with what was going on "inside her head"?

"I can read the minds of the people I touch. Miss Mori, I want to listen to more of your feelings." 
Koharu was bewildered, but through the connection she first felt and the warmth of his fingertips, her heart gradually opens up.

(Source: Mechacomic)
description.ja: “無口でクールなデザイナー”として社内で一目置かれる森 心春。しかしそれは吃音症による過去のトラウマから、「最低限の挨拶のみ」で「対人関係を作らない」という処世術だった。二度と昔のような経験はしたくないと、本来の明るくて元気な性格を押し殺して過ごす日々。だけど、本当は誰かと関わってみたい。例えば――恋愛とか、結婚とか。そんな憧れを抱いていたある日、コミュ強で人気者の営業・成田とぶつかってしまう。近い距離や、転ばないよう回された腕にドキドキする心春をよそに、成田の興味は心春の“頭の中”にあり…? 「俺、触れた人の心が読めるんです。――森さんの気持ち、もっと聞いてみたいです」戸惑う心春だったが、初めて感じた繋がりと指先の熱さに、次第に心を開いていき…。
